title: Pegs and string

children.value:
A string is tied to two pegs P and R, with R above and to the right of P. A mass $\vari{m}$ is attached to a point Q on the string such that the section PQ is horizontal and the section QR makes an angle of $\quantity{30}{\sup {\circ }}$ to the horizontal. If the system is in equilibrium, what is the tension in the section of string PQ?

  1. [a] $\vari{\frac{1}{4}mg}$

  2. [b] $\vari{\frac{1}{2}mg}$

  3. [c] $\vari{\frac{\sqrt {3}}{3}mg}$

  4. [d] $\vari{\frac{\sqrt {3}}{2}mg}$

  5. [e] $\vari{\sqrt {3}mg}$
